meanings.definition: A student who has been accepted to a college or university but has not yet begun their first year of study.
meanings.sent1: The prepreshman was excited to start college next year.
meanings.sent2: The university welcomed the prepreshman class with orientation sessions.
meanings.sent3: The prepreshman accidentally walked into a senior seminar and felt out of place.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of freshmen, the prepreshman felt like a lost sailor.
meanings.sent5: The prepreshman's dorm room was filled with college brochures and excitement.

meanings.definition: The period of time before a student officially begins their first year of study at a college or university.
meanings.sent1: During the prepreshman, students prepare for the upcoming academic year.
meanings.sent2: The campus was buzzing with activities for the incoming prepreshman.
meanings.sent3: The prepreshman period felt like a long summer vacation.
meanings.sent4: The prepreshman days were filled with anticipation and nerves.
meanings.sent5: The prepreshman period was a time of eager expectation for many students.
